location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Ext 1904/47 'Request for addresses from Political Resident, Persian Gulf'

physicalDescription.extent: The file's contents are arranged in approximate chronological order from the rear to the front of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 7, these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: This file consists of letters and telegrams between officials on behalf of the Secretary of State for Commonwealth Relations, London and the Political Resident in Persian Gulf regarding a request from the Political Resident in Bahrain for the address of the British High Commissioners in India and Pakistan.The file includes a divider which gives the subject number, the year the subject file was opened, the subject heading, and a list of correspondence references by year. This is placed at the back of the correspondence.

name.namePart: Secretary of State for Commonwealth Relations
